Sam Moore.description: conversing about Sam and Tom are chatting about Sam's birthday party at The Rose and Crown Pub, with Tom unable to attend due to work but suggesting catching up another time. @ <persona> Tom Moreno
chat: Sam Moore
Hey Tom, how's it going? Busy day at the store?
Tom Moreno
Hey Sam, it's been a busy day at the store. How are you doing today?
Sam Moore
I'm doing well, thanks. Just picking up some party decorations for my birthday celebration tomorrow at The Rose and Crown Pub. Are you planning on coming?
Tom Moreno
That sounds like fun, Sam! Unfortunately, I won't be able to make it tomorrow as I have to work at the store in the morning.
Sam Moore
No worries, Tom. I understand work comes first. Maybe we can catch up another time?
Tom Moreno
I hope you have a great time at your birthday celebration, Sam!
